# Pep-Talk / Peptide-Truth App â€” Build Notes

## Mission (Non-Negotiable)
Pep-Talk exists to be the most trustworthy, educational, public-facing
source of truth for peptides and bioactive compounds.

Education stays free.
Tools, personalization, and advanced utilities are premium.

---

## Monetization Strategy (High Level)

### Free (Always)
- Peptide lookup (PDPs)
- Risk scores, tiers, evidence grades
- Educational content
- Safety pages
- Topics & discovery
- Clean, ad-light UX

### Pro (Paid)
- Stack Builder (create, save, compare)
- Blend deep dives
- Saved stacks & favorites
- User profiles
- Personalized recommendations
- Advanced comparison tools

---

## Advertising & Sponsors

- Sitewide rotating banner system
- Mobile-first priority
- Appears on:
  - Home
  - PDPs
  - Blends
  - Key navigation surfaces
- Sponsor offers are:
  - Clearly labeled
  - Non-invasive
  - Never embedded into educational claims

---

## Homepage Intent

Homepage should:
- Feel welcoming and credible
- Explain how to navigate the app
- Clearly communicate Free vs Pro
- Promote Pro without pressure
- Contain editable regions (no redeploy required)

Planned sections:
- Welcome / About
- How to use Pep-Talk
- Pro benefits overview
- Sponsor banner area
- Call to action (Subscribe to Pro)

---

## User Accounts (Planned, Not Yet Built)

Future user capabilities:
- Profiles
- Saved peptides
- Favorites
- Saved stacks
- Pro-only features tied to account

Auth + billing intentionally deferred until UX + value are locked.

---

## Build Philosophy

- Mobile-first
- Trust > monetization
- No dark patterns
- No medical advice
- Clear separation between:
  - Education
  - Tools
  - Advertising

---

## Roadmap Snapshot

### V1 (Current)
- Education
- Risk system
- PDPs
- Topics
- Search
- Evidence grading

### V2
- Homepage editable regions
- Sponsor banner system
- Pro upsell surfaces (UI only)

### V3
- Auth
- Profiles
- Stack Builder
- Subscriptions
